user.title: Configure Intelligent Heating Pilot
user.description: Set up your Intelligent Heating Pilot (IHP) integration for intelligent preheating calculations based on learned thermal slopes from your VTherm.

data_description.vtherm_entity_id: The Versatile Thermostat to control (source of learned slope)
data_description.scheduler_entities: The HACS Scheduler Component switches that control this VTherm
data_description.humidity_in_entity_id: Room humidity sensor to refine calculations
data_description.humidity_out_entity_id: Outdoor humidity sensor to refine calculations
data_description.cloud_cover_entity_id: Cloud coverage sensor to account for solar impact
data_description.lhs_window_hours: Time window before target to search for relevant heating slopes
data_description.lhs_retention_days: Number of days to keep historical slope data
data_description.decision_mode: Choose how heating decisions are made: Simple (rule-based) or ML (AI-powered, requires IHP-ML-Models add-on)

init.title: Modify Intelligent Heating Pilot Options
init.description: Modify the entities used by Intelligent Heating Pilot
